name: nw_connection_group_state_t
desc: States that indicate whether you can use a connection group to send and receive messages.

items.name: var nw_connection_group_state_invalid: nw_connection_group_state_t
items.desc: The connection group is not valid.

items.name: var nw_connection_group_state_waiting: nw_connection_group_state_t
items.desc: The connection group is waiting for a network path change.

items.name: var nw_connection_group_state_ready: nw_connection_group_state_t
items.desc: The connection group is joined, and ready to send and receive data.

items.name: var nw_connection_group_state_failed: nw_connection_group_state_t
items.desc: The connection group encountered a fatal error.

items.name: var nw_connection_group_state_cancelled: nw_connection_group_state_t
items.desc: The connection group has been canceled.
